title: Best of The Herd for Oct 01, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Oct 01, 2020
description:
-The NBA Finals looks like it's over

-The Browns cannot beat the Cowboys if Baker makes it a shootout

-Has LeBron had a better career than Michael Jordan?

-Cam Newton would not be this successful outside of New England


Guests: Greg Cosell, NFL Films

Tristan Thompson, NBA Champion
